类 BookingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • BookingController

  • public class BookingController
extends java.lang.Object
    The BookingController class is for the most bringing together and furthers the functions of the Hall, Discount, Review Booking and Quotation Classes. It interacts with the PrimeEvents Class for the overall PrimeEvents System function
    从以下版本开始:
    10 September 2019
    版本:
    21 October 2019
    作者:
    Team 90

        返回:
        1 if booking exists

      • checkBookDate

        public int checkBookDate(int hallNo,
                         java.util.Date startDate,
                         java.util.Date endDate)
        Check whether booking is the same as previously booked dates for same hall
        参数:
        hallNo - Requires specific hall number to be inputted
        startDate - start Date of each booking of specified hall
        endDate - end date of each booking of specified hall

      • checkBookingReview

        public void checkBookingReview(java.lang.String cusEmail)
        method check booking review
        参数:
        cusEmail - customer email needs to be specified

      • checkBookingStatus

        public int checkBookingStatus(java.lang.String startDate,
                              java.lang.String endDate)
        Check whether Date relate to today to auto update booking status
        参数:
        startDate - end Date of each booking of specified hall

      • checkDate

        public int checkDate(java.util.Date startDate,
                     java.util.Date endDate)
        method check the number of days of the booking
        参数:
        startDate - which date is booking supposed to start
        endDate - which date is booking supposed to end
        返回:
        0 if booking is for 1 day

      • checkHallName

        public int checkHallName(java.lang.String email,
                         java.lang.String hallName)
        method to check the hall name. Whether the hall name exists for the owner of the hall. If it exists, returns hall index if not, return 01
        参数:
        email - owner email needs to be specified to search
        hallName - what is the hall name that is being searched
        返回:
        index returns specific index with the name of the hallowner

        参数:
        ownerEmail - ownerEmail must be specified
        返回:

      • setBook

        public void setBook(int index,
                    boolean reviewStatus,
                    java.lang.String bookingStatus,
                    int hallNo,
                    int customerNo,
                    java.lang.String ownerEmail,
                    java.lang.String customerEmail,
                    int quotationIndex,
                    java.lang.String startDate,
                    java.lang.String endDate,
                    java.lang.String cardholderName,
                    java.lang.String cardNumber,
                    java.lang.String expiryDate,
                    java.lang.String CVV,
                    double deposit)
        method to set a booking within a specified index
        参数:
        index - index is required to place booking details within the index
        reviewStatus - Has there been a review made to the booking
        bookingStatus - has it been booked
        hallNo - which hall is it for
        customerNo - which customer is it for
        ownerEmail - which owner does the hall belong to
        customerEmail - which customer is making the booking
        quotationIndex - what is the quotation index which is being turned to booking
        startDate - what is the startDate of the booking
        endDate - what is the enddate of the booking
        cardholderName - card details name of the cardholder
        cardNumber - what is the cardnumber of the card
        expiryDate - what is the expiry of the card
        CVV - what is the cvv number of the card
        deposit - how much is the deposit

      • setDiscount

        public void setDiscount(int index,
                        java.lang.String discountName,
                        java.lang.String discountDesc,
                        double discountRate)
        set discount information to specific discount
        参数:
        index - position to be specified
        discountName - discount name to be specified
        discountDesc - Discount description to be specified
        discountRate - discount rate to be specified

      • setHall

        public void setHall(int index,
                    java.lang.String hallOwnerEmail,
                    java.lang.String hallName,
                    java.lang.String hallAddress,
                    int hallCapacity,
                    double hallPrice,
                    boolean anniversary,
                    boolean birthday,
                    boolean weddingCeremony,
                    boolean weddingReception,
                    boolean catering,
                    java.lang.String menuDesc,
                    boolean photography)
        method to set information within specified index for hall
        参数:
        index - place information within the specified index
        hallOwnerEmail - email of the owner email
        hallName - hall name
        hallAddress - address of hall
        hallCapacity - Maximum capacity of hall
        hallPrice - base price of hall
        anniversary - does hall host anniversary
        birthday - does hall host birthday event
        weddingCeremony - does hall host wedding Cremony event
        weddingReception - does hall host wedding Reception event
        catering - does the hall offer catering services
        menuDesc - the menu description for catering
        photography - does the hall offer photography service

      • setQuotation

        public void setQuotation(int index,
                         int hallNo,
                         java.lang.String ownerEmail,
                         java.lang.String customerEmail,
                         java.lang.String startDate,
                         java.lang.String endDate,
                         java.lang.String bookEventType,
                         int numberPeople,
                         boolean catering,
                         java.lang.String menuOption,
                         boolean photography,
                         java.lang.String contactEmail,
                         java.lang.String contactPhone,
                         double additionalFee,
                         double totalPrice,
                         double totalPriceAfterDiscount,
                         boolean ownerConfirmation,
                         boolean cusIsConcession,
                         boolean isBook)
        set a quotation details within specified index
        参数:
        index - which index to store it in
        hallNo - the number of corresponding hall for quotation
        ownerEmail - email of owner
        customerEmail - email of customer
        startDate - proposed startdate of booking
        proposed - endDate of booking
        bookEventType - which type of event is it
        Numberpeople - proposed number of people attending
        catering - is catering required
        menuOption - if catering is required which option
        contactEmail - what is the email to contact
        contactPhone - what is the phone number to contact
        additionalFee - the additional fees for catering and/or photography service
        TotalPrice - total price
        totalpRIceAfterDiscount - total price after discount is applied
        photography - is photography servces required
        ownerConfirmation - has owner confirmed
        cusIScONCESSION - IS CUSTOMER A CONCENcession

      • setReview

        public void setReview(int index,
                      int bookingNo,
                      int hallNo,
                      java.lang.String cusEmail,
                      double decorationRating,
                      double serviceRating,
                      double overallRating,
                      java.lang.String reviewDesc)
        Mutator method for review.
        参数:
        index - index number for which to store the incoming information
        bookingNo - booking number of the review
        hallNo - hall number of which review is referring to
        cusEmail - Details of customer (customer Email)
        decorationRating - rating on decorations of hall
        serviceRating - rating of service of hall
        overallRating - overall rating of hall
        reviewDesc - additional comments for the review
